Class Reservation

java.lang.Object
Reservation
public class Reservation extends Object
The Reservation controller for the reservation menu.
Since:
2021-11-13
Version:
1.0
Author:
Foo Jun Ming

  • Constructor Details

    • Reservation

      public Reservation​(int[] array_no_of_seats)
      Creates a new reservation controller.
      Parameters:
      array_no_of_seats - The list of tables with each entry containing the number of seats in that table.

  • Method Details

    • checkForTable

      public static int checkForTable​(int num_pax, LocalDateTime start_booking)
      Checks for table avaliability for reservation.
      Parameters:
      num_pax - The number of customers to be allocated to a table.
      start_booking - The start time of the reservation.
      Returns:
      The index of the table if available, -1 if table is not available.

    • newReservation

      public static String newReservation​(int table_no, int num_pax, String cust_name, char member_input, String cust_contact, LocalDateTime reserved_date)
      Creates a new reservation, schedule the timeout and output to user that a new reservation is successfully made.
      Parameters:
      table_no - The table number of the table to be allocated for reservation
      num_pax - The number of customers to be allocated to a table.
      cust_name - The name of the customer making the reservation.
      member_input - If True, customer is a member.
      cust_contact - The contact number of the customer.
      reserved_date - The date and time of the reservation.
      Returns:
      The output string to acknowledge successful reservation.

    • tablesAvaliable

      public String tablesAvaliable()
      Prints entire list of available table.
      Returns:
      The output string of the entire list of available tables.

    • currentTableOccupency

      public static boolean currentTableOccupency()
      Check for occupied tables.
      Returns:
      True if there are any tables currently occupied.

    • currentReservations

      public static boolean currentReservations()
      Check for existing reservations.
      Returns:
      True if there are any existing reservations.

    • custReservationDetails

      public static String custReservationDetails​(int cust_id, boolean get_name_only)
      Check for customer reservation details given reservation ID.
      Parameters:
      cust_id - The ID of the reservation.
      get_name_only - Only return name if this is True.
      Returns:
      The reservation details given reservation ID.

    • findReservation

      public static ReservationDetails findReservation​(int cust_id)
      Find customer reservation details given reservation ID.
      Parameters:
      cust_id - The ID of the reservation.
      Returns:
      The reservation details given reservation ID and return null if not found.

    • removeReservation

      public static boolean removeReservation​(int cust_id)
      Remove reservation given reservation ID
      Parameters:
      cust_id - The ID of the reservation.
      Returns:
      True if removal is successful. False if ID not found or customer has already checked into the restaurant.

    • checkInReservation

      public static String checkInReservation​(int cust_id, String staff_name)
      Checks in customer given reservation ID.
      Parameters:
      cust_id - The ID of the reservation.
      staff_name - The name of the staff who checked in the customer.
      Returns:
      The acknowledgement string if checking in is successful. Else, return string to show unsuccessful check in.

    • checkOutReservation

      public static boolean checkOutReservation​(int cust_id, char confirmation)
      Checks out customer given reservation ID.
      Parameters:
      cust_id - The ID of the reservation.
      confirmation - The character to confirm to check out.
      Returns:
      True if checking out is successful.

    • resetCustID

      public static void resetCustID()
      Reset successful reservation counts to 0.

    • getSize

      public int getSize()
      Gets the number of customers who have checked in.
      Returns:
      The number of customers checked in.

    • getArr

      public Customer[] getArr()
      Gets the array of customers who have checked in.
      Returns:
      The array of customers checked in.
